annonstext:
AVL is the world's largest independent company for development, simulation and testing technology of powertrains (hybrid, combustion engines, transmission, electric drive, batteries and software) for passenger cars, trucks and large engines and their integration into the vehicle.

Experienced Automotive Software Engineer
BMS, electric motor control and/or combustion engine control

*  Development of innovative strategies and functions based on current standards
  *  Analyze and evalute new/exisiting concepts and solutions
  *  Technical support for customer projects as well as in internal projects
  *  Identification of developments in the area of responsibility

*  Master degree in Software Engineering, Vehicle Engineering or Electrical Engineering
  *  Master degree in Software Engineering, Vehicle Engineering or equivalent work experience.
  *  Deep technical powertrain control and architecture
  *  Profound experience in model-based or C-based development.
  *  A genuine interest in engine and powertrain technology
  *  Automotive product development experience, SoP preferred
  *  Leadership and high level of social skills, fluent in Swedish and English

Meriting:
  *  Agile methods and processes
  *  Understanding and awareness of ISO26262
  *  Development tools such as ETAS INCA, trace32, PTC Integrity, ATI Vision.
  *  Driver license B (C and/or D preferred)

informationAnsokningssatt: Ansökan skickas till: P.O. Box 223, Haninge, SE
